column6: FALL OF THE NEW MUTANTS PART 1 Spinning out of SECOND COMING, the New Mutants who are still left are licking their wounds on a forced R & R trip. While they try and put themselves back together, others are looking to take them apart.
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | colorist:Brian Reber | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Leonard Kirk | artist:Dave Wilkins
